data.title: Come for a great beer, not a meal
data.text: I fall on the wrong side of the definition for this listing: beer (even with bagged pretzels for sale) is not food. This is more of an activity than a restaurant. We came here expecting dinner at a highly rated restaurant. They do have occasional food truck support, but nothing is prepared on premises. The beer is terrific and highly recommended.

data.title: Woo hoo, a local brewery!
data.text: What a great variety of beers available. I'm an IPA drinker and enjoy some other tasty brews on occasion.  I especially enjoyed an IPA they brewed with a hint of jalapeños.

data.title: Amazing Beer Selections
data.text: This little brewery is amazing! Wide selection of amazing and unique beers. Raging Rooster was the best Irish Red I have ever tasted! The staff is exceptional and the environment is cozy and feels very welcoming! I will absolutely be stopping by here again.

data.title: Best small brewery in the Inland Empire.
data.text:
A great place to go with friends or meet new ones.  All employees are very friendly and knowledgeable about BEER.  Robert, the owner, can tell you all about what's on tap and new beers in the works.  
They specialize in beer styles that you will not find at any of the breweries in Temecula.  Just an absolutely FUN atmosphere.  I'm there most every Monday.
